verses.name: Luke 5:29
verses.text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house: and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them.

verses.name: Luke 5:30
verses.text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying, Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners?

verses.name: Luke 5:31
verses.text: And Jesus answering said unto them, They that are whole need not a physician; but they that are sick.

verses.name: Luke 5:32
verses.text: I came not to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
